## {{< fa file >}} Description

This is a workshop on writing functions in R, with editing from [Sam Csik](https://github.com/samanthacsik) and [Juliette Verstaen](https://www.julietteverstaen.com/). I also made a few illustrations for the event!

## {{< fa pencil >}} Illustrations

![Basic function structure as explained by Saturn.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/an-bui/RLadiesSB-FUNctions/main/figures/function-structure.jpg){description="A smiling planet Saturn explains function structure against a dark blue background.
